meanings.definition: A type of wild ass found in Tibet and northern China.
meanings.sent1: In Tibet, the kiangs roam freely across the vast grasslands.
meanings.sent2: The kiangs in northern China are known for their endurance and speed.
meanings.sent3: The kiangs decided to have a race to see who was the fastest wild ass.
meanings.sent4: The kiangs symbolize the untamed spirit of the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the kiangs galloping across the plains was truly majestic.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'kiang', referring to more than one wild ass.
meanings.sent1: A group of kiangs grazed peacefully near the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The kiangs traveled together in search of fresh vegetation.
meanings.sent3: The farmers were surprised to see so many kiangs in their fields.
meanings.sent4: The valley echoed with the calls of the kiangs as they communicated with each other.
meanings.sent5: The herd of kiangs moved gracefully through the rugged terrain.
